sentences.en: Arm yourselves and be ready to fight.
sentences.cn: 武装起来,准备战斗.

sentences.en: Back to back! Wrap yourselves up!
sentences.cn: 背对背！把你们自己包起来！

sentences.en: Believe in yourselves.
sentences.cn: 相信你们自己。

sentences.en: But what is ultimately most important here is that you are asking the question —not just of me but of yourselves.
sentences.cn: 但是我在这儿说的最重要的是：你们在问那些问题——不仅是问我，而是在问你们自己。

sentences.en: Did you make these cakes yourselves?
sentences.cn: 这些蛋糕是你们亲手做的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't keep them all to yourselves; we must share and share alike.
sentences.cn: 你不要自己全部独吞; 我们事事都应均分.

sentences.en: Don't let decadent ideas eat into yourselves.
sentences.cn: 别让颓废的思想侵蚀你们.

sentences.en: Go and build a house for yourselves.
sentences.cn: 去为你们自己造一幢房子吧。

sentences.en: Help yourselves to sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 请你们自己随意拿三明治吃.

sentences.en: I need not press the urgency of the matter on you, as I konw you are fully aware of it yourselves.
sentences.cn: 我无需向你们强调此事的急迫性，因为我知道，你们自己对此完全了解。

sentences.en: I wouldn't want to cause such important people as yourselves any bother.
sentences.cn: 我不想给你们这样的大人物添任何麻烦。

sentences.en: I've been wondering if you yourselves have any idea why she came.
sentences.cn: 我一直在想，你们自己是否知道她为什么来。

sentences.en: If you don't behave yourselves I'll box your ears!
sentences.cn: 你们若不规矩,我会打你们耳光的!

sentences.en: Not just for yourselves, but for your generation and generations to come.
sentences.cn: 不只是为你们自己，而且是为你们一代人以及未来的几代人。

sentences.en: Squeeze yourselves a little.
sentences.cn: 请各位再挨紧一点.

sentences.en: Sylvia shook hands. "Well, you go get yourselves some breakfast."
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅摆了摆手说：“嗯，你们自己去吃些早餐吧。”

sentences.en: You escaped serious injury by a whisker, so consider yourselves very lucky.
sentences.cn: 你差一点就受重伤, 你应该觉得自己很幸运.

sentences.en: You must decide for yourselves.
sentences.cn: 得由你们自己来决定.

sentences.en: You must resign yourselves to waiting a bit longer.
sentences.cn: 你们要耐心多等一会儿.

sentences.en: You must settle the matter amongst yourselves.
sentences.cn: 你们必须彼此商量,自行解决这些问题.

sentences.en: You ought to be ashamed of yourselves. You've created this problem.
sentences.cn: 你们应该感到惭愧，都是你们惹的祸。
